name: M&M’S Adventure - Puzzle Games
description:
Play with your favorite M&M’S characters in the first and only M&M’S mobile game: Explore the M&M’S universe and enjoy the adventure with your favorite M&M’S characters! Participate in time-limited events, and collect and unlock unique M&M’S accessories in these casual matching puzzles. The fun world of M&M’S has thousands of adventures waiting to be played!

PLAY FUN AND CHALLENGING PUZZLES
M&M’S Adventure is based on challenging puzzle games with different colors & candies for you to match. There are over 1,000 levels: Unlock all these puzzles and reach the highest level! Participate in live events, try out new puzzles, and enjoy M&M’S Adventure for free. Match and blast endless candies while traveling across the world with your M&M’S friends: Live the adventure and collect and unlock your favorite M&M'S accessories!

CHOOSE YOUR FAVORITE COLORS AND CHARACTERS
- Progress through these puzzle games and explore the fun and exciting world of M&M’S Adventure
- Collect your favorite M&M’S accessories and advance through puzzles with your character to progress in this casual game
- Play these free games anytime and anywhere
- Unlock levels and become the best puzzle player!

COLLECT AMAZING M&M’S ACCESSORIES
All your favorite M&M’S characters are here – Red, Yellow, Blue, Orange, Green, and Brown! Match and connect candies, and collect unique and original accessories that really make your M&M'S characters come to life! Blast and match colors in our M&M’S Adventure for free. Use your device to match the color you want to connect and complete puzzles. Take your matching skills to the next level and become the champion of this challenge with your favorite M&M’S team.

SEASONAL EVENTS EVERY MONTH
More puzzles and levels will be added every month, as well as new game modes, real-time events, and rewards. Unlock levels and collect unique accessories by completing the events until you have your favorite team ready to play. Our seasonal events will have you coming back again and again until you become a puzzle master.

TRAVEL AROUND THE WORLD WITH M&M’S
Travel around the world with your favorite M&M’S characters, completing different levels filled with chocolatey puzzles. Blast and pop M&M’S candies in different scenarios and locations. Take your matching skills to the next level.
Are you ready to travel with us in M&M’S Adventure?
